General.Name: Qvolta
General.Description: Qvolta is a global P2P exchange platform that allows users to quickly and easily convert cryptocurrencies into the fiat currencies, and vice versa. Qvolta will provide individuals a reliable and convenient platform to quickly buy or sell cryptocurrencies with help of the most popular payment methods for the fiat currencies available in the country of his/her residence. In order to ensure the best user experience as well as protect the users, Qvolta will act as a guarantor for the trades executed on the platform. Security will further be provided by services as Qvolta Wall and Qvolta Security.

ICO.Description:
Qvolta is a global P2P exchange platform that allows users to quickly and easily convert cryptocurrencies into the fiat currencies, and vice versa. Qvolta will provide individuals a reliable and convenient platform to quickly buy or sell cryptocurrencies with help of the most popular payment methods for the fiat currencies available in the country of his/her residence. In order to ensure the best user experience as well as protect the users, Qvolta will act as a guarantor for the trades executed on the platform. Security will further be provided by services as Qvolta Wall and Qvolta Security.

Team:

  • Kirill Murzin: CEO, Co-Founder. 
  • Viacheslav Averkin: CEO, Co-Founder. 
  • Ilia Filatov: CBDO, Co-Founder. 
  • Dmitry Semenov: Development Team Lead, Co-Founder. 

Qvolta will be holding its ICO on MONTH DAY, 2017. The ICO token supply represents 80% of the total token supply, so there will be a total of 175,000,000 tokens available, for 0.001 ETH each at the offering. There is no the minimum amount of fund-raising for the ICO.

Token Reserve Split (20%):

  • 19% Project Team;
  • 01% Bounty Campaign;

Qvolta's ICO will feature a bounty campaign.
